song.title: Glass Bone
song.info:
From PM's commercial musicdisk see http://www.purplemotion.net/
Lyrics: This is it, This is it,
Don't need to be p e r f e c t. Just be myself.
Please God. Concentrate.
Concentrate
Download link for the CD: http://www.dura.fi/x/Purple_Motion_-_Musicdisk-Retail-2004-mCZ/
There are remixes of e.g. Starshine in there...
